author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Warm up the béchamel sauce, add the chopped parsley, cream and lemon juice, taste and season, then serve.
ingredients: 600ml/1 pint béchamel sauce,  5 heaped tbsp fresh parsley, finely chopped ,  1 tbsp single cream ,  1 tsp lemon juice ,  salt ,  freshly ground black pepper
